name: Mr. Shifty
summary: Mr. Shifty follows a teleportation-fueled heist to break into the world’s most secure facility. Shift through bullets, and master lightning-fast takedowns in an all new kind of action game: A speed-stealth, kung-fu brawler about a teleporting thief, combining fast top-down gameplay with the ferocity of '90s Hong Kong action cinema.
